txt.en: Defeat All-seeing cultists ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'Come on, this way!'
Defeat the Barkhûshim!
'You both are a sight for sore eyes. Even you, Razâl.'
Defeated All-seeing cultists ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Free Numûru from his bonds
Speak with Numûru in the Angar Aragín
A group of Okhíso's personal guard step out, ready to do battle!
Speak with Razâl
Defeated Okhíso's personal guards ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Find the other prisoners
Free the first prisoner
Listen to Mizâdi and Okhíso
Free the second prisoner
Free the third prisoner
You must move quickly into Angar Aragín to save Numûru!
Defeat the Barkhûshim ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Speak with Razâl inside the Angar Aragín.
Listen to Okhíso's dying words
Speak with Mizâdi in the tower
Descend and leave the tower of Kûr Anzar
Defeat Okhíso's guards and archers ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
You spy Okhíso with his archers and personal guard
Defeated Barkhûshim ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat Okhiso
Go with Razâl up the tower stairs to find Numûru
You hear a cry behind you, and a voice calls out in challenge
Speak with Razâl inside the Angar Aragín
Folllow Razâl and defeat All-seeing cultists ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeated Barkhûshim ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Razâl has faltered!

'My thanks. The Barkhûshim seem to have an unhealthy appreciation for my blood. It does wonders for me. I think it would not work nearly so well for their dark lord, but they would hear none of it.

'They stuck me several times. It's fortunate you came when you did, or there would be precious little left of me to collect.

'I can manage my way out of here - there are others trapped above us. Please help them escape as well.'
Go with Mizâdi up the tower stairs to confront Okhíso
'He is wounded. I will get him out of Kûr Anzar, leave it to me. Free those poor souls above us, they need your aid most now. Then meet us back in Urmâkh.'
Defeat Okhíso's personal guards ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
A group of All-seeing cultists scramble to confront you!
Defeated All-seeing cultists ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'There will be time for talk later. We must get outside, and quickly. We must save Kûr Anzar and her people!'
Speak with Numûru in the Angar Aragín.
Go with Razâl up the tower stairs to find Numûru and defeat All-seeing cultists.
Free the prisoners.
Defeat Karâshna Zíri

'There's no telling what we may find here. I believe they bring the sacrifices upstairs to one of their dark altars. That is likely where we'll find Numûru and any other unfortunates they've gathered.'
Free Numûru from his bonds.
'I feel so cold. You arrived just in time. Thank you.'
Ascend the stairs and defeat the Barkhûshim ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'Praise be to you! I knew we would be saved!'
'A pity. I was looking forward to watching the other two get sacrificed. A bargain I must swallow for my own life, I suppose.'
Defeated Okhíso's guards and archers ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
<rgb=#ff0000>Razâl must not falter</rgb>
Speak with Razâl in the Angar Aragín.
'No! These are my sacrifices. How dare you try to steal them from me?!'
Find the other prisoners.
Defeat Karâshna Zíri.
Okhíso and Mizâdi draw their swords
Finish your ascent at the tower room to confront Okhíso
Speak with Mizâdi in the tower.
Descend and leave the tower of Kûr Anzar at its base.
Ascend the stairs and defeat the Barkhûshim guarding the other prisoners.
Instance: A Dark Gift
Go with Mizâdi up the tower stairs to confront Okhíso
